dataSpace.name: getList
dataSpace.sql: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by [BizDate] desc) as rownum, * from ( SELECT [Id], DATENAME(YEAR, [BizDate]) AS [Year], DATENAME(MONTH, [BizDate]) AS [Month], [BizDate], [VendorCode], [VendorName], [RawVendorName] [VendorProvince], [VendorCity], [VendorType], DATA.[DistributorCode], DATA.[DistributorName], D.[DistributorLevel], [DistributorProvince], [DistributorCity], [ProductCode], [ProductName], DATA.[brand], [Specification], [LotNo], [Quantity], [UnitName],PRH4,PRH5, [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([RawPrice],1) AS [RawPrice], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([RawAmount],1) AS [RawAmount], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([Price],1) AS [Price], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([Amount],1) AS [Amount], [Manufacturer], [RawSpecification], [AdditionalNote], [RecordNo], [CreateTime] FROM [dbo].[VIEW_DataPurchase] as DATA left join Distributor D ON D.DistributorCode = DATA.DistributorCode WHERE BizDate >= '@{startDate}' AND BizDate <= '@{endDate}' ) tb where @{filter} AND @{distributor}

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by [BizDate] desc) as rownum, * from ( SELECT [BizDate] , DATENAME(YEAR, [BizDate]) AS [Year], DATENAME(MONTH, [BizDate]) AS [Month], DATA.[DistributorCode], DATA.[DistributorName] as distributorname, DATA.[DistributorLevel], D.DistributorCode AS AscriptionCode, D.DistributorName AS AscriptionName, [CustomerCode], C.Family, [CustomerName], [CustomerType], DATA.[brand], DATA.[ProductCode], DATA.[ProductName], P.ProductType, [Quantity], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney](DATA.[Price], 1) AS [Price], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([Amount], 1) AS [Amount], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([RawPrice], 1) AS [RawPrice], [dbo].[GetSeparatorThousandMoney]([RawAmount], 1) AS [RawAmount], [CustomerProvince], [CustomerCity], DATA.[Specification], [LotNo], [UnitName], DATA.[Manufacturer], [CustomerAddress],P.PRH4,P.PRH5, [RawSpecification],[CreateTime] FROM [dbo].[VIEW_DataSales] AS DATA LEFT JOIN [dbo].[DistributorRelationship] DRS ON DRS.SubDistributorCode = DATA.DistributorCode LEFT JOIN dbo.Distributor D ON D.DistributorCode = DRS.DistributorCode LEFT JOIN dbo.Company C ON C.CompanyCode = DATA.CustomerCode LEFT JOIN dbo.Product P ON P.ProductCode = DATA.ProductCode WHERE BizDate >= '@{startDate}' AND BizDate <= '@{endDate}') tb WHERE @{filter} and @{distributor}

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by [DistributorCode] desc) as rownum, * from ( SELECT DATA.brand, bizdate, month, DATA.distributorcode, DATA.distributorname, DATA.distributorprovince, DATA.distributorcity, productcode, productname, producttype, lotno, consignmentquantity, inventorystatus, quantity, unitname, manufacturer, rawspecification,PRH4,PRH5, D.[DistributorLevel],[CreateTime] FROM [dbo].[VIEW_DataInventory] as DATA LEFT JOIN dbo.Distributor D ON D.DistributorCode = DATA.DistributorCode WHERE BizDate = '@{endDate}' )tb where @{filter} and @{distributor}
